application

Class Mainmenucontroller

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.Mainmenucontroller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class Mainmenucontroller
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class acts as controller class for the Mainmenu.fxml file This is the class which handles the mainmenu page. All user actions such as starting a game,changing settings is supported by this class.
    Author:
    hrithik

    • Method Detail

      • Resume

        void Resume(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
     throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is used to handle the event when player clicks the resume button on the mainmenu page. It is possible to resume only if the previous game is unfinished.
        Parameters:
        event - This parameter is the ActionEvent which is generated when the user clicks the resume button.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • Build2

        private void Build2(Game old)
             throws java.io.IOException
        This method is used to build the 15X10 grid incase the user wants to resume a previous game
        Parameters:
        old - instance of game which will be restored
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • Build1

        java.io.IOException

      • serialize

        public static void serialize(Game g,
                             java.lang.String v)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        This method is used to serialize/save the game at any point of time
        Parameters:
        g - Game class object which is to be saved
        v - Input file denoting the destination where game is saved
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • deserialize

        public static Game deserialize(java.lang.String h)
                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        This method is used to deserialize/restore the game
        Parameters:
        h - String value denoting the file from which we want to restore
        Returns:
        Game object deserialized from input file

        java.io.IOException
